TopicTitle: First in depth Russian T-14 Armata documentary

Articles.Content:
They actually showed the interior of the factory, the suspension, the tank interior, the crew capsule, and the derivative models of the T-14. Some parts of the tank were blurred out, especially the turret ring.

I have to say, the Russians made a mean looking tank. Let's just hope that they don't break down en route to a battlefield.
Some of the versions really do look like something out of a sci-fi movie.
